message:
fix: DEV-3754: Memory usage of repeater initialization causing crashes (#1025)

* fix: DEV-3754: Fix performance issues with repeater and memory intensive tag structures

* make repeater tag creation as lazy as possible

* lazy eval repeater pages with time slicing

* cleanup the hydration cache

* more lazy repeater work

* fix annotation reset so that the store does not double initialize

* fix the tests

* fix spacing/imports

* this should fix the tests, cleanup a previous attempt of freeing memory

* put back the instances Set

* reset repeater page between task changes

* fix resetting repeater page between clientside transitions, retaining page reloads placement

* fix reseting page on label steam and review steam

Co-authored-by: Julio Sgarbi <julio.sgarbi@hotmail.com>
